# Module: tf.compat.v2.xla.experimental

Public API for tf.xla.experimental namespace.

<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->


## Functions

[`compile(...)`](../../../../tf/xla/experimental/compile): Builds an operator that compiles and runs `computation` with XLA.

[`jit_scope(...)`](../../../../tf/xla/experimental/jit_scope): Enable or disable JIT compilation of operators within the scope.
